F

Fade - Class in com.stickycoding.Rokon.SpriteModifiers
Fade allows Sprite's to visibly fade in and out, and has the option to remove the sprite from the layer once the fade is completed.
Fade(int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class com.stickycoding.Rokon.SpriteModifiers.Fade
No handler is used
Fade(int, int, boolean, BasicHandler) - Constructor for class com.stickycoding.Rokon.SpriteModifiers.Fade
BasicHandler is used, and onFinished is triggered when all loops are done
fadeIn(int) - Method in class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Menu.MenuObject
 
fadeIn(int, float) - Method in class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Menu.MenuObject
 
fadeOut(int) - Method in class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Menu.MenuObject
 
FadeTo - Class in com.stickycoding.Rokon.SpriteModifiers
FadeTo allows Sprite's to visibility fade in and out to a given value over a given timeframe
FadeTo(int, float) - Constructor for class com.stickycoding.Rokon.SpriteModifiers.FadeTo
 
FadeTo(int, float, BasicHandler) - Constructor for class com.stickycoding.Rokon.SpriteModifiers.FadeTo
BasicHandler is used, and onFinished is triggered when all loops are done
finished(Sprite) - Method in class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Handlers.AnimationHandler
 
FixedBackground - Class in com.stickycoding.Rokon.Backgrounds
A very basic, static textured background image
FixedBackground(Texture) - Constructor for class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Backgrounds.FixedBackground
 
fixedHeight - Static variable in class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Rokon
 
fixedWidth - Static variable in class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Rokon
 
fixLandscape() - Method in class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Rokon
Fixes the screen in landscape mode
fixPortrait() - Method in class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Rokon
Fixes the screen in portrait mode
Font - Class in com.stickycoding.Rokon
 
Font(String) - Constructor for class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Font
Creates a Font, it's respective texture, and adds it to the atlas.
forceLetterBox() - Method in class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Rokon
Forces the engine to enter letterbox mode (blacking out all objects that aren't fully on screen, for when aspect ratios differ)
forceLetterBox(boolean) - Method in class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Rokon
Defines whether or not to force letterbox mode
forceOffscreenRender() - Method in class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Rokon
Forces the engine to render objects which appear to be offscreen (therefore invisible)
forceOffscreenRender(boolean) - Method in class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Rokon
Defines whether or not the engine renders objects which appear to be offscreen
forceTexttureRefresh() - Method in class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Rokon
Forces the engine to recreate the atlas rather than loading an old configuration
forceTextureRefresh(boolean) - Method in class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Rokon
Defines whether or not the engine recreates the atlas rather than using an older configuration
fps(boolean) - Method in class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Rokon
Toggles whether to output FPS through Debug
freeze() - Method in class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Rokon
Freeze's rendering, but does not pause the game time
freezeUntilTexturesReloaded() - Method in class com.stickycoding.Rokon.Rokon
Freezes the engine until all textures have been reloaded onto the hardware
